name: The Count's Manor
description:
Introduction: You wake up in a basement and you have no idea how you've got there. You must find a way out but be careful, the Count doesn't want you to leave...

Discord Server: https://discord.gg/qhHzQYg

Brief Story: A rich count is looking for a handyman to take care of his manor. You get the job and once you get into the manor he drug you and lock you up in his basement. You then discover that the count was continually putting up similar job advertisements to lure people in his manor to fulfill his unhealthy desire to chase and kill.

Info: Secret Switches, Secret Rooms Loot, Traps and Hiding places are random, so, each time you play it's gonna be different.
The Manor level it's hard but doable, the key to winning is patience... And a bit of luck.

Tips: Scout for any hiding places before interacting with secret switches.
Make noises to lure the Count when needed.
Watch out for the stamina, it may keep you alive.
Use the lantern wisely, being in the dark could be dangerous.
